name: Hundred
description:
Item Setup, Battles, that's all there is.

Set up your items and choose your skills wisely to increase your power.
Increase your power to defeat your enemies.

The outcome of battles is determined with just one button press.

Player
The player can equip one weapon, ten rings, and ten skills.
Let's set up our items and skills to maximize their effects.

Constraints
Players have a limited cost to work with.
Higher-tier items consume more cost.
Of course, there are recovery methods as well.

Enemies
Enemies have various characteristics.
Each characteristic has its own resistances and weaknesses.
If you don't consider this, even the best items will become useless.

Stages
There are a total of 100 floors in the stages. The game's name is 'Hundred
